channel.title: Activities on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Activities on Universal

item.title: Data Science Bootcamp 2024
item.description:
Overview

The Data Science Bootcamp 2024 offers an intensive, hands-on program that equips participants with essential skills in data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. It’s perfect for professionals and students looking to advance their expertise in data science.

item.title: AI Workshop 2024
item.description:
Overview

The AI Workshop 2024 is designed to bring together researchers and practitioners in the field of artificial intelligence. This workshop will cover the latest trends and research in AI, including machine learning, natural language processing, and robotics.
